functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Bastille Key\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Those strong enough to resist the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"power of the evangelists get locked","color":"gray"}','{"text":"in the Bastille, where they await the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"death of the false prophet.
